attributes.action: allow people to walk naked around primary schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People should be given the right to walk around primary schools naked if they so wish .. its a violation of my human rights! Im allowed  to do it at home so why not near or in schools!
Please consider this as i feel it will be welcomed by the pubic.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
